name: Scare Me
description: Scare Me is a personal game project.  ! Work in progress ! The game is in its early stages, there are only concepts and programming research for now. This will evolve when I have the time to dedicate myself to it.  What there is was done some time ago. The ultimate goal being to achieve a usable and completely finished game. The game is a ghost simulator. We embody a spirit and we move like the camera in management games. Our goal is to interact with the elements present in front of us to try to scare the residents and scare them away from their homes. The current game contains a prototype of movement and interactions with objects, as well as a random spawn of objects and characters. I removed the displacements of certain AI because they were not very to the point. You can move with the keyboard and rotate the camera with the right mouse click Blueprint programming in UE4
